languages.text: "Органика — несовершенное подобие машины, изменчивое и уязвимое. Металл стабильнее, эффективнее и долговечнее. Плотьяз ущербен в сравнении с бинарным языком. В мясе живет слабость — из-за него дряхлеет разум и ослабевает дисциплина, изношенный же металл просто заменяется. К тому же, машина — более высокая форма Знания, и, придавая себе механическую форму, мы становимся ближе к Омниссии".

traits.locale_text: "Органика — несовершенное подобие машины, изменчивое и уязвимое. Металл стабильнее, эффективнее и долговечнее. Плотьяз ущербен в сравнении с бинарным языком. В мясе живет слабость — из-за него дряхлеет разум и ослабевает дисциплина, изношенный же металл просто заменяется. К тому же, машина — более высокая форма Знания, и, придавая себе механическую форму, мы становимся ближе к Омниссии".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Organic tissue is an imperfect replica of the machine, transient and vulnerable. Metal is more stable, more effective, and more durable. Flesh-speak is flawed next to binharic language. Meat begets weakness — it softens the mind and undermines discipline, but you can replace metal when it wears down. In addition, a machine is a supreme form of Knowledge, and by assuming mechanical form we become closer to the Omnissiah."
languages.original_text: "Органика — несовершенное подобие машины, изменчивое и уязвимое. Металл стабильнее, эффективнее и долговечнее. Плотьяз ущербен в сравнении с бинарным языком. В мясе живет слабость — из-за него дряхлеет разум и ослабевает дисциплина, изношенный же металл просто заменяется. К тому же, машина — более высокая форма Знания, и, придавая себе механическую форму, мы становимся ближе к Омниссии".

traits.locale_text: "Organic tissue is an imperfect replica of the machine, transient and vulnerable. Metal is more stable, more effective and more durable. Flesh-tongue is flawed next to binary language. Meat begets weakness — it softens the mind and undermines discipline, but you can replace metal when it wears down. Additionally, machine is a supreme form of Knowledge, and by assuming mechanical form we become closer to the Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Organic tissue is an imperfect replica of the machine, transient and vulnerable. Metal is more stable, more effective, and more durable. Flesh-speak is flawed next to binharic language. Meat begets weakness — it softens the mind and undermines discipline, but you can replace metal when it wears down. In addition, a machine is a supreme form of Knowledge, and by assuming mechanical form we become closer to the Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “有机组织仅仅是机器不完美的复制品，肉体短暂而脆弱。相比之下，金属更稳定、更高效，也能耐用。与二进制语言相比，肉体的语言是有缺陷的。因为肉体会产生弱点，它会软化思想，破坏规则。相比之下，如果是金属磨损的话，只要替换掉就可以了。不仅如此，机器是知识最高级的形式。通过将身体改造为机器，我们也会更加接近欧姆尼塞亚。”
languages.original_text: "Organic tissue is an imperfect replica of the machine, transient and vulnerable. Metal is more stable, more effective, and more durable. Flesh-speak is flawed next to binharic language. Meat begets weakness — it softens the mind and undermines discipline, but you can replace metal when it wears down. In addition, a machine is a supreme form of Knowledge, and by assuming mechanical form we become closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: “有机组织仅仅是机器不完美的复制品，肉体短暂而脆弱。相比之下，金属更稳定、更高效，也能耐用。与二进制语言相比，肉体的语言是有缺陷的。因为肉体会产生弱点，它会软化思想，破坏规则。相比之下，如果是金属磨损的话，只要替换掉就可以了。不仅如此，机器是知识最高级的形式。通过将身体改造为机器，我们也会更加接近欧姆尼塞亚。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El tejido orgánico es una réplica imperfecta de la máquina, efímera y vulnerable. El metal es más estable, eficaz y resistente. Los idiomas de la carne son defectuosos en comparación con el binario. La carne lleva a la debilidad. ablanda la mente y socava la disciplina, mientras que cuando el metal se deteriora es posible sustituirlo. Además, una máquina es la forma suprema del conocimiento, y al adoptar forma mecánica nos acercamos al Omnissiah».
languages.original_text: "Organic tissue is an imperfect replica of the machine, transient and vulnerable. Metal is more stable, more effective, and more durable. Flesh-speak is flawed next to binharic language. Meat begets weakness — it softens the mind and undermines discipline, but you can replace metal when it wears down. In addition, a machine is a supreme form of Knowledge, and by assuming mechanical form we become closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: «El tejido orgánico es una réplica imperfecta de la máquina, efímera y vulnerable. El metal es más estable, eficaz y resistente. Los idiomas de la carne son defectuosos en comparación con el binario. La carne lleva a la debilidad. ablanda la mente y socava la disciplina, mientras que cuando el metal se deteriora es posible sustituirlo. Además, una máquina es la forma suprema del conocimiento, y al adoptar forma mecánica nos acercamos al Omnissiah».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「有機組織は機械の不完全なレプリカであり、一過性で傷つきやすいものだ。金属はより安定し、より効果的で、より耐久性がある。肉の声はバイナリック語のつぎに欠陥がある。肉は弱さを生む。心を軟化させ、規律を損なうが、金属は消耗したら取り替えることができる。加えて、機械は最高の知の形であり、機械の形をとることによって、私たちは万機神に近づくことができるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Organic tissue is an imperfect replica of the machine, transient and vulnerable. Metal is more stable, more effective, and more durable. Flesh-speak is flawed next to binharic language. Meat begets weakness — it softens the mind and undermines discipline, but you can replace metal when it wears down. In addition, a machine is a supreme form of Knowledge, and by assuming mechanical form we become closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: 「有機組織は機械の不完全なレプリカであり、一過性で傷つきやすいものだ。金属はより安定し、より効果的で、より耐久性がある。肉の声はバイナリック語のつぎに欠陥がある。肉は弱さを生む。心を軟化させ、規律を損なうが、金属は消耗したら取り替えることができる。加えて、機械は最高の知の形であり、機械の形をとることによって、私たちは万機神に近づくことができるのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Organisches Gewebe ist eine unvollkommene Nachbildung der Maschine, vergänglich und verletzlich. Metall ist stabiler, effektiver und haltbarer. Fleischsprech ist Binhärsprech weit unterlegen. Fleisch führt zu Schwäche — es lässt den Verstand weich werden und untergräbt die Disziplin. Metall dagegen kann man ersetzen, wenn es verschleißt. Darüber hinaus ist eine Maschine eine überlegene Form des Wissens, und indem wir mechanische Form annehmen, können wir dem Omnissiah näher sein."
languages.original_text: "Organic tissue is an imperfect replica of the machine, transient and vulnerable. Metal is more stable, more effective, and more durable. Flesh-speak is flawed next to binharic language. Meat begets weakness — it softens the mind and undermines discipline, but you can replace metal when it wears down. In addition, a machine is a supreme form of Knowledge, and by assuming mechanical form we become closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: "Organisches Gewebe ist eine unvollkommene Nachbildung der Maschine, vergänglich und verletzlich. Metall ist stabiler, effektiver und haltbarer. Fleischsprech ist Binhärsprech weit unterlegen. Fleisch führt zu Schwäche — es lässt den Verstand weich werden und untergräbt die Disziplin. Metall dagegen kann man ersetzen, wenn es verschleißt. Darüber hinaus ist eine Maschine eine überlegene Form des Wissens, und indem wir mechanische Form annehmen, können wir dem Omnissiah näher sein."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le tissu organique est une réplique imparfaite de la machine, éphémère et vulnérable. Le métal est plus stable, plus efficace et plus solide. La parole naturelle n'a pas l'exactitude du binhaire. La chair engendre la faiblesse ; elle ramollit l'esprit et ébranle la discipline, mais le métal peut être remplacé en cas d'usure. De plus, les machines sont une forme suprême de Connaissance, et en devenant nous-mêmes mécaniques, nous nous rapprochons de l'Omnimessie. »
languages.original_text: "Organic tissue is an imperfect replica of the machine, transient and vulnerable. Metal is more stable, more effective, and more durable. Flesh-speak is flawed next to binharic language. Meat begets weakness — it softens the mind and undermines discipline, but you can replace metal when it wears down. In addition, a machine is a supreme form of Knowledge, and by assuming mechanical form we become closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: « Le tissu organique est une réplique imparfaite de la machine, éphémère et vulnérable. Le métal est plus stable, plus efficace et plus solide. La parole naturelle n'a pas l'exactitude du binhaire. La chair engendre la faiblesse ; elle ramollit l'esprit et ébranle la discipline, mais le métal peut être remplacé en cas d'usure. De plus, les machines sont une forme suprême de Connaissance, et en devenant nous-mêmes mécaniques, nous nous rapprochons de l'Omnimessie. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Organic tissue is an imperfect replica of the machine, transient and vulnerable. Metal is more stable, more effective, and more durable. Flesh-speak is flawed next to binharic language. Meat begets weakness — it softens the mind and undermines discipline, but you can replace metal when it wears down. In addition, a machine is a supreme form of Knowledge, and by assuming mechanical form we become closer to the Omnissiah."

languages.text: "Organik doku, makinenin kusurlu bir replikasıdır. Fânidir, savunmasızdır. Metal daha stabil, daha efektif ve daha dayanıklıdır. Bedensel konuşma, ikilidile kıyasla yetersizdir. Et, zayıflık demektir. Zihni yumuşatır ve disiplinin temelini çürütür, metal ise aşındığında değiştirilebilir. Ek olarak makine, İrfanın üst biçimidir. Biz de mekanik bir biçime bürünerek Hermesih'e daha da yaklaşırız."
languages.original_text: "Organic tissue is an imperfect replica of the machine, transient and vulnerable. Metal is more stable, more effective, and more durable. Flesh-speak is flawed next to binharic language. Meat begets weakness — it softens the mind and undermines discipline, but you can replace metal when it wears down. In addition, a machine is a supreme form of Knowledge, and by assuming mechanical form we become closer to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: "Organik doku, makinenin kusurlu bir replikasıdır. Fanidir ve savunmasızdır. Metal daha stabil, daha efektif ve daha dayanıklıdır. Bedensel konuşma, ikilidil yanında yetersizdir. Et, zayıflık demektir. Zihni yumuşatır ve disiplinin temelini çürütür, metal ise aşındığında değiştirilebilir. Ek olarak makine, İrfanın üst biçimidir ve mekanik bir biçime bürünerek Hermesih'e daha da yaklaşırız."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
